title: If the legacy client is gone, why is my League folder 2 GB larger?

replies.body:
Because your Game files have been overeating, and they should really go on a diet. :V

Actually, the real reason is that some of the left over files from the Legacy client. We are clearing them out over future patches though, so you should see that size go down with more updates. Just let your files be fat n happy for now, we'll be taking care of it soon. ^^
when do you estimate the Legacy Client's full retirement? because i'm seeing comments saying people still have it
